column1: Monthly survey of food services and drinking places (x 1,000) 1 2

column2: Total, food services and drinking places
This table replaces CANSIM table 355-0001 which archived with the release of the November 2007 data.
Due to rounding, components may not add to total.

At the Canada level, seasonally adjusted data are only available for receipts. At the provincial and territorial levels, seasonally adjusted data are only available for the receipts of total, food services and drinking places.
For reference year 1998 and January, February and March 1999, the Canada total includes the territories, but the territory data are not available.

column1: How to cite: Statistics Canada. Table 21-10-0019-01  Monthly survey of food services and drinking places (x 1,000)
